name: Light Speed (TtV-Games)
description:
Fly your ship through space, avoid the lasers and rack up massive point in this endless space laser dodger game!

This game was created for Brackeys Game Jam

Controls:
  • WASD/Arrows/Controller Joystick - Move your ship
  • Escape/F10 - Pause the game 
Gameplay:
  • Green lasers - Collect these to increase your multiplier. If you miss any, your multiplier will reset.
  • Yellow lasers - These will block your path and move you back towards the deadly laser at the bottom.
  • Red lasers - Watch out for these as they will kill you instantly!
Tips:
  • Move diagonally for a speed boost and a way to get out of tight situations.
  • Stay near to the top of the level so that you have more time to react.
Team:
  • Steven Osborne - Mainly Programming
  • Paul Roberts - Mainly Art
Notes:
  • The hard mode button doesn't do anything.
  • The game is not in a completed state, it is missing many features such as music and animations.
  • There can sometimes be impossible situations generated, sorry.
  • Thanks for playing!
